derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bār, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch beer and German Bär

entry.def: A boar or a wild boar is a wild pig.

example.ex: Wild boar are numerous in the valleys.
example.tran: 山谷里有无数野猪出没。

entry.def: A boar is a male pig.

means.word_mean: 1. Old World wild swine having a narrow body and prominent tusks from which most domestic swine come; introduced in United States

sentences.en: The hunters were closing in on the struggling wild boar.

sentences.en: The rage of a wild boar is able to spoil more than one wood.
The team sent some people out hunting and they bagged a wild boar.
sentences.cn: 那个队派了一些人去打猎,他们打了一头野猪。
